derivation: from a presumed compound of G1401 (δουλαγωγέω) and G71 (δουλαγωγέω);
strongs_def: to be a slave-driver, i.e. to enslave (figuratively, subdue)
outline:
1. to lead away into slavery, claim as one's slave
  2. to make a slave and to treat as a slave i.e. with severity, subject to stern and rigid discipline
